Package de.iss.mv2.logging

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LogEntry
    A log entry containing information to a runtime message.
    Logger
    A logger to track runtime messages.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConsoleLogger
    A logger to log all events on the standard output streams.
    DefaultLogEntry
    The default log entry.
    LogEntryPrinter
    Creates a string containing the available informations about a log entry.
    LoggerManager
    Manages the current logger.
    StackTracer
    A helper class to retrieve the current stack trace.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LogEntryLevel
    The type of a log entry declaring its relevance.
    StackTracingLevel
    A level of stack tracing to perform by a Logger.
